item.title: Applying Linked List to Embedded systems
item.description: Before diving into our application , we need to know about Linked List and Arrays in general. Array Array is a type of data structure which can be used when we know that only a fixed memory space is required. if we consider an integer array of 3 elements int a[3] ==> 3*4 = 12 bytes of memory (int datatype requires 4 bytes of memory) In case of an integer array of size 50
